title: Stargate Atlantis - Season 4 (complete)
description:
Ok, so I added the two last episodes that were missing from my previous compilation to make this a FULL SEASON 4 RELEASE. As I mentioned last time, these are all downloaded from various sources at ThePirateBay.

This time around however, I have personally watched all of episodes 1-19 and can confirm that they work perfectly for me in Windows Media Player. I have also skipped through some of them in Quicktime on my Mac so that shouldn&#039;t be a problem either. However, as usual I recommend you getting VLC player just incase something won&#039;t play.
I did skip through the last episode a bit myself, but I&#039;m not going to watch that until the release of 5x01 for obvious reasons.

No annoying episode-by-episode downloading and no frustrating unpacking of rar files! Woohoo!!


/NeverRAR






Original Message:
>Grabbed these from different tpb sources, hope they are all ok. Though as I&#039;m writing this I HAVE NOT YET TESTED them.
>
>I put this together since there wasn&#039;t any Atlantis compilation around at the time (well ok, I found one with eps 1-7 with lo seeds), and it really sucks having to download episode by episode and then dscover I have to unrar half of them to watch them! Me not having a rar application on this computer makes that even more of a bitch.
>
>Well, anyways, here you are. Thanks to the great me you wont have to go through that insanely boring process yourselves.
>
>/NeverRAR
